description: You can't beat a meatball sub and your kids will thank you for this homemade meatball and slaw sub that ticks all the boxes.
name: Easy Meatball & Slaw Subs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, roughly chopped
6 extra soft hot dog rolls, split

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Spray a medium baking dish with oil.

Combine mince, zucchini, garlic, breadcrumbs and dried herbs in a medium bowl. Season with pepper. Using hands, roll heaped tablespoonfuls of mixture into 16 balls. Place in dish and bake for 18 minutes or until browned.
Add passata and basil to dish and stir to combine. Bake for 10 minutes or until passata has thickened and meatballs are cooked through.
Place coleslaw in a bowl. Add parsley and toss to combine. Divide coleslaw mixture among rolls, then top with meatballs in tomato sauce and cheese. Serve.
